TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ControlSite implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示工作表上链接或嵌入式控件。

span.span: Represents a linked or embedded control on a worksheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A使用时返回方法以向文档添加控件。A is returned when you use the method to add a control to a document. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在运行时向 Office 文档添加控件](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md)。For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md). [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)]

summary.span: 激活 。

span.span: Activates the .

returns.span: 如果成功激活了 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the was successfully activated; otherwise, .

summary.span: 获取 的创建者。

span.span: Gets the creator of the .

value.span: 一个 对象，表示该 的创建者。

span.span: An object that represents the creator of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此属性与 OLE 自动化对象，以返回该对象的应用程序。You can use this property with an OLE Automation object to return the application of that object.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 在包含其的工作簿打开时是否自动加载。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the is automatically loaded when the workbook that contains it is opened.

value.span: 如果 在包含其的工作簿打开时自动加载，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is automatically loaded when the workbook that contains it is opened; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 ActiveX 控件，将忽略此属性。This property is ignored by ActiveX controls. 打开工作簿时，始终进行加载 ActiveX 控件。ActiveX controls are always loaded when a workbook is opened. 对于大多数 OLE 对象类型，此属性不应设置`true`。For most OLE object types, this property should not be set to `true`. 默认情况下，属性设置为`false`为新的 OLE 对象; 这将保存时间和内存时 Microsoft Office Excel 正在加载工作簿。By default, the property is set to `false` for new OLE objects; this saves time and memory when Microsoft Office Excel is loading workbooks. 自动加载 OLE 对象的好处是，对于表示易失性数据的对象，可以立即重新建立指向源数据和必要时可以再次呈现的对象。The benefit of automatically loading OLE objects is that, for objects that represent volatile data, links to source data can be reestablished immediately and the objects can be rendered again if necessary.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 在源更改时是否自动更新。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the is updated automatically when the source changes.

value.span: 如果 在源更改时自动更新，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is updated automatically when the source changes; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性才有效仅当链接对象 (其属性必须为)。This property is valid only if the object is linked (its property must be ).

value.span: 一个 ，表示位于 的右下角下面的单元格。

span.span: A that represents the cell that lies under the lower-right corner of the .

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在其中创建 的应用程序。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the application in which the was created.

value.span: 一个 32 位整数，指示在其中创建 的应用程序。

span.span: A 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the was created.

value.span: 如果对象是在 Microsoft Office Excel 中创建的，则此属性返回字符串 XCEL（该字符串与十六进制数 5843454C 等效）或值 。

span.span: If the object was created in Microsoft Office Excel, this property returns the string XCEL, which is equivalent to the hexadecimal number 5843454C, or the value .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性旨在用于在 Excel 中 Macintosh，其中每个应用程序具有四个字符创建者代码。The property is designed to be used in Excel for the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以剪切仅嵌入的图表。Only embedded charts can be cut.

summary.span: 获取或设置从 的左边缘到列 A 的左边缘（位于工作表上）或图表区域左边缘（位于图表上）的距离（以磅为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance, in points, from the left edge of the to the left edge of column A (on a worksheet) or the left edge of the chart area (on a chart).

value.span: 从 的左边缘到列 A 的左边缘（位于工作表上）或图表区域左边缘（位于图表上）的距离（以磅为单位）。

span.span: The distance, in points, from the left edge of the to the left edge of column A (on a worksheet) or the left edge of the chart area (on a chart).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该窗口最大化，此属性返回一个负数，而异基于窗口边框的宽度。If the window is maximized, this property returns a negative number that varies based on the width of the window border. 将此属性设置为 0 （零） 将使窗口稍微小小于其应有应用程序窗口被最大化时。Setting this property to 0 (zero) will make the window a tiny bit smaller than it would be if the application window were maximized. 换而言之，如果属性为 0 （零），Microsoft Office Excel 主窗口的左边的框仅能执行将在屏幕上可见。In other words, if the property is 0 (zero), the left border of the main Microsoft Office Excel window will just barely be visible on the screen.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值标识链接到 的值的范围。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that identifies the range linked to the value of the .

value.span: 一个值，标识链接到 的值的范围。

span.span: A value that identifies the range linked to the value of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将值放在链接的单元格，采用此值。If you place a value in the linked cell, the takes this value. 同样，如果你更改的值，值也放在单元格中。Likewise, if you change the value of the , that value is also placed in the cell.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值标识用于填充指定列表框的范围。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that identifies the range used to fill the specified list box.

value.span: 一个值，标识用于填充指定列表框的范围。

span.span: A value that identifies the range used to fill the specified list box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft Office Excel 读取的范围中每个单元格的内容，并插入到列表框中的单元格的值。Microsoft Office Excel reads the contents of every cell in the range and inserts the cell values into the list box. 列表跟踪范围的单元格中的更改。The list tracks changes in the range’s cells. 设置此属性将销毁列表框中的任何现有列表。Setting this property destroys any existing list in the list box. 列表框的列表中创建了方法，此属性返回一个空字符串 ("")。If the list in the list box was created with the method, this property returns an empty string ("").

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否锁定了 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the is locked.

value.span: 如果锁定了 ，则为 ；如果可在工作表受保护时修改 ，则为 。

span.span: if the is locked; if the can be modified when the sheet is protected.

span.span: One of the following values: if the object is linked (it exists outside of the file), or if the object is embedded (it is entirely contained within the file).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性始终返回相同的字符串，因为由相同的 ActiveX 控件托管在 Office 项目中的所有托管的控件。This property always returns the same string, because all managed controls in Office projects are hosted by the same ActiveX control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有对象集合，集合中的第一个对象是在 z 顺序的底层对象且处 z 顺序的前面的对象集合中的最后一个对象。In any collection of objects, the object at the back of the z-order is the first object in the collection, and the object at the front of the z-order is the last object in the collection.
